casebody.data:
DTH MEDIA CORPORATION, et al.
v.
FOLT, et al. 142PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 15, 2019 Hugh Stevens, Attorney at Law, Michael J. Tadych, Attorney at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Stephanie A. Brennan, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matt Burke, Solicitor General Fellow, for Folt, Carol L., et al. Troy D. Shelton, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Vicitim Rights Organizations.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 15th of January 2019 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of January 2019."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 29th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
